snippet: The Republican who defeated Eric Cantor in a congressional primary this week is a professor there — and so is the Democrat he will run against in November.
abstract: Randolph-Macon College in Ashland, Va, has emerged as an unlikely political hotbed following Rep Eric Cantor's primary defeat; both David Brat, who defeated Cantor, and his Democratic opponent Jack Trammell are professors at the college.
lead_paragraph: The Republican who defeated Eric Cantor in a congressional primary this week is a professor there — and so is the Democrat he will run against in November.

headline.main: Randolph-Macon College a Political Hotbed in Hiding
headline.print_headline: Randolph-Macon College a Political Hotbed in Hiding
